title: In the Dust
description: It’s a funny thing going home…There are more cows than people in Willow Creek and Dixie doesn’t want to risk her return threatening that balance.She thought she left that tiny Georgia town behind her but a phone call changes everything, sending her right back to her grandpa’s farm for the summer.What her family failed to mention is her first love, and first heartbreak Colton Payne will be there too.Thrown back into her old life, will she reminisce or run away?
author: H.L. Swan
